is a small city in the southwest corner of

. It is located off I-55, 81 miles south of Jackson and 108 miles north of New Orleans. It is also located about 15 miles from the Louisiana State Line.It was chartered in 1872 and was and still is considered the hub of Pike County. It was the home of the Illinois Central Gulf Railroad yards and the largest city in the county. The main line of the Illinois Central (now the Canadian National Railroad) passes thru the city in a direct route from New Orleans to Chicago. McComb has a history of a stable economic base with the railroad shops having had a 70 year association with the area.

its not the county seat

value: I-55 (Southaven, Grenada, Canton, Jackson, Hazlehurst, Brookhaven, McComb)
Hwy 51 (Southaven, Grenada, Canton, Jackson, Hazlehurst, Brookhaven, McComb)

To get to McComb from Jackson or Memphis, take I-55 South ramp in South Jackson that labels McComb/New Orleans. Pass through small towns such as Byram, Crystal Springs, Hazlehurst, Brookhaven, and Summit. When you pass through Summit, you will see 2 interstate signs that will let you know you are in the McComb area. McComb has 3 main exits that will let you off into the city. I-55 Exit 18 (Veterans Blvd /Hwy 570/ North McComb), Exit 17 (Delaware Ave/ Downtown McComb), and Exit 15 ( Presley Blvd/ U.S 98/ Hwy 24 South McComb) Presley Blvd/ U.S 98 to South McComb/ Tylertown and Hwy 24 to Liberty.

which is located south of McComb.
has an active bus depot in McComb. It is located off I-55 at Delaware Ave Exit 17 in the Downtown McComb Area at 320 N. Broadway St. If you want to contact the depot, call (601)-250-1030.

, the national passenger rail system, provides service to McComb. Amtrak Train 59, the southbound City of New Orleans, is scheduled to depart McComb at 12:41pm daily with service to Hammond and New Orleans. 
Amtrak Train 58, the northbound City of New Orleans, is scheduled to depart McComb at 3:38pm daily with service to Brookhaven, Hazlehurst, Jackson, Yazoo City, Greenwood, Memphis, Newbern-Dyersburg, Fulton, Carbondale, Centralia, Effingham, Mattoon, Champaign-Urbana, Kankakee, Homewood, and Chicago. McComb has a train depot station which is located 114 Northeast Railroad Ave in Downtown McComb.

is a large shopping center in South McComb on Presley Blvd:Hwy 98. The shopping center has been here since 1966 and is still in good looking shape. The shopping center has over 40 stores. Many restaurants, businesses, and stores are located nearby.

value: located on 1436 Delaware Ave. +1 601 249-0209 Have great mexican food at this restaurant in McComb. You can go and eat all you want on the buffet.

content=Located off I-55 at Delaware Ave on 255 Anna Dr Ext. +1 601 684-8601 It has the best and most great buffet food you would want to eat. It is newly built from it's old location on Delaware Ave and moved by Interstate 55 on Anna Dr.

located 1604 Veterans Blvd. The China Buffet restaurant is part of the Edgewood Mall area located in North McComb,MS. Located off I-55 Exit 18 ( Veterans Blvd) infront of Wal-Mart Supercenter next to Radio Shack across from the shopping center. China Buffet is a wide selection of Asian Cuisine, also with American fares. It has a great and excellent salad bar. The eating area's at this restaurant are very clean and table service is prompt.

content=If you are looking for some home southern cooked meal, the Dinner Bell is the place you need to go. It is a restaurant home with 8 round tables and very prompt style. The food is terrific with great Fried Chicken, Corn Bread, Macaroni & Cheese, Mash Potatoes, Collard Greens, Great Sweet Tea, and Plenty More to come. This restaurant has been in McComb since 1947, and is still the best looking restaurant.

located on 1722 Veterans Blvd in the Edgewood Mall. Broma's Deli is a very delighted restaurant to enjoy all kinds of sandwiches, salads, and the best sweet tea. If you are looking for great sweet tea to enjoy and to bring your taste buds up, Broma's Deli is the best place.

located on Hwy 48 in McComb. This is where you will find some of the best southern catfish. Along with other food serving like all kinds of chicken, french fries, and more food that fits in with catfish.
directions=off I-55 at Veterans Blvd exit in front of the Edgewood Mall
content=A clean restaurant with great food, clean tables, and nice service.

McComb has over 70 restaurants in the city . It has a lot of fast food restaurants, and more restaurants you can imagine. Most of the restaurants are located on Delaware Ave off I-55.

value: content=Located on 107 Scott Dr. The Comfort Inn in McComb has 56 rooms and has been in McComb a very long time. It has great service and excellent rooms.

content=Located off I-55 at Exit 17 Delaware Ave, +1 601 684-5566. Days Inn McComb is the largest Days Inn In the central and south Mississippi area. The motel has 115 rooms and a dining restaurant inside of it. Days Inn has great service and spacious rooms to feel comfortable in.
located off I-55 at Exit 17 Delaware Ave on 101 Anna Drive, +1 601 249-4300,

. Bestern Inn & Suites is McComb's newest hotel with 63 rooms. Recently, Best Western used to be in McComb, but was changed to Days Inn Motel in 2001. The city has brought the hotel back and is now making tons of great service and is very clean and relaxable.

content=Located off I-55 at Exit 18 on 2001 Veterans Blvd, +1 601 684-8655. Hawthorn Inn & Suites came to McComb in 2003. It's located west of I-55 and is located on the other side down from the mall. There are 75 rooms in the hotel. It is a great and most relaxable hotel to enjoy staying in. It is located next to Arby's, Legacy Ford Lincoln Mercury and McComb's new hotel the Hampton Inn.
located off I-55 at Exit 18 at Veterans Blvd on 109 Manisha Drive, +1 601 249-4116,

. Hampton Inn & Suites is McComb newest hotel which opened in late November 2007. The hotel has at least 75 rooms. Complimentary hot breakfast served daily. On-site fitness center and outdoor pool. Meeting space is also available for those corporate meetings, family gatherings, baby showers, weddings or any reception for groups up to 75.

content=Non-smoking, pet-friendly. Free wifi, HBO, air conditioning, parking, Southern hot breakfast buffet. Draft beer Monday-Thursday 5-7PM. Manager's special includes free dinner every Wednesday 5.30PM-7.30PM.
